title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Ensure that a new user can register successfully using valid and complete information.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Fill in the registration form with valid username, email, and password
Submit the registration form
Verify user is registered successfully and redirected appropriately

title: User Registration with Missing Mandatory Fields
description: Verify registration form validation when mandatory fields are empty or missing.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Attempt to submit the registration form leaving mandatory fields blank
Verify that proper validation messages are shown and registration is blocked

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Check that a user can successfully log in with correct username/email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click login button
Verify that login is successful and the dashboard page is displayed

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login failure with incorrect username/email or password and corresponding error handling.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username/email or password
Click login button
Verify login is rejected and an appropriate error message is displayed

title: Dashboard Loads and Displays Key Elements
description: Ensure the dashboard loads correctly after login and all relevant summaries and quick links are visible.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials
Verify the dashboard page loads without errors
Check that key summaries and navigation links are present and visible

title: Create New Quote with Valid Materials and Services
description: Verify that a user can create a new quote adding materials and services with correct data and see accurate calculations.

steps.description: Navigate to New Quote page
Fill quote form with valid customer and quote details
Add multiple materials and services from catalog with specified quantities and prices
Save the new quote
Verify quote is saved and quote details including correct calculations are displayed

title: Edit Existing Quote and Validate Updated Calculations
description: Verify editing a quote updates information and recalculates totals correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Quote Detail page for an existing quote
Modify materials, services, or quantities within the quote
Save the edited quote
Verify the updated quote details reflect the changes and calculations are correct

title: View Quote Details Displays Accurate Data
description: Ensure that viewing quote details shows all correct information and calculations are accurate.

steps.description: Navigate to Quote Detail page for an existing quote
Verify all quote fields, materials, services and calculated totals are displayed correctly

title: Add New Material Item
description: Verify users can add a new material item to the materials catalog successfully and data is persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to Materials Management page
Add new material with valid name, description, unit price, and other required fields
Save the new material
Verify material appears in material list and data persists after refreshing page

title: Edit Existing Material Item
description: Confirm that editing a material updates its information correctly and changes persist.

steps.description: Navigate to Materials Management page
Select an existing material and modify its fields (e.g., price or description)
Save changes
Verify material list displays updated data and updates persist after reload

title: Remove Material Item
description: Verify user can delete a material from materials catalog and it no longer appears in the list.

steps.description: Navigate to Materials Management page
Delete an existing material item
Confirm material is removed from the list and deletion persists after page refresh

title: Add New Service Item
description: Check that a new service can be added to the services catalog with valid data and persists correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Services Management page
Add new service with valid name, description and pricing details
Save the new service
Verify the new service shows in the service list and persists after reload

title: Edit Existing Service Item
description: Verify editing an existing service updates its data correctly and changes persist.

steps.description: Navigate to Services Management page
Select a service and update its fields
Save changes
Confirm updated service data is shown and persists after reload

title: Remove Service Item
description: Confirm that a user can delete a service item from the services list successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to Services Management page
Delete a selected service
Verify the service no longer appears in the list and deletion persists after reload

title: Update User Profile Successfully
description: Verify users can update their profile information and changes persist after save.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile page
Modify user profile details such as name, contact info, or preferences
Save the profile changes
Confirm that updated profile details are displayed and persist after page reload

title: Update Company Settings Successfully
description: Ensure company settings can be modified and changes persist correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Company Settings page
Change company information and preferences
Save the settings
Verify that changes are reflected in the UI and persist after reload

title: Application UI Responsiveness on Different Screen Sizes
description: Validate that the UI adjusts appropriately and remains usable on various screen sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Access multiple pages such as Login, Dashboard, Quote Management, Materials, Services, and Settings on different screen sizes
Verify UI components resize and rearrange correctly and remain functional without layout breaking

title: UI Elements Follow TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui Styling Standards
description: Ensure all UI elements conform to the specified styling standards consistently across the application.

steps.description: Navigate through the application pages checking UI components
Verify styling is consistent, uses TailwindCSS utility classes, and shadcn/ui components properly without visual glitches

title: Quote Creation with Edge Case Values
description: Test quote creation with edge case input such as zero quantities, very large numbers, or special characters to check validation and calculation stability.

steps.description: Navigate to New Quote page
Input edge case values for materials and services quantity and price fields
Attempt to save the quote
Verify appropriate validation messages appear or calculations handle these correctly without crashing

title: Materials and Services Persistence After Concurrent Updates
description: Simulate concurrent updates to materials or services records and verify that the system handles changes without data corruption.

steps.description: Update a material or service record simultaneously in two separate sessions or browser tabs
Save the changes from both sessions sequentially
Verify data integrity is maintained and last saved data is consistent without errors
